import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { Form, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import Header from '../../components/Sales/Header'; import { IconDashboardSales, IconHome, IconDashboardStaff, IconDashboardSalesApp, iconNotify, IconDashboardPending, IconDashboardApproved, IconDashboardDeclined, IconDashboardFunded, IconDashboardCanceled, IconDashboardPreApprovals, IconDashboardIncomplete, IconSearchInActive, IconSmallArrowRight } from '../../assets/images'; import { searchCustomers } from '../../redux/actions/customers'; class HomeScreen extends Component { state = { lastName: '', city: '', searchShow: false } onSalesApp = () => { this.props.history.push('/sales'); } onSales = () => { this.props.history.push('/sales-list'); } handleSearchClick = () => { const body = { last_name: this.state.lastName, city: this.state.city } this.props.searchCustomers(body); this.setState({ searchShow: true }); } handleSearchRowClick = (cifno) => { this.props.history.push(`/customer/${cifno}`); } render() { const { lastName, city, searchShow } = this.state; // const { customers } = this.props; const customers = [ { }, { }, { } ] return (
this.setState({ backModal: true })} />

) } } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ avatar: state.auth.avatar, customers: state.customers }); export default connect( mapStateToProps, { searchCustomers } )(HomeScreen);
